snippet: Representatives from Britain and Germany, two of the largest members of the European Union, abstained from the voting, which left the proposal in limbo.
abstract: Proposed measure to restrict use of pesticides that have been blamed for bee die-offs worldwide is left in limbo after representatives from Britain and Germany abstain from voting, leaving European Commission without needed qualified majority.
lead_paragraph: Representatives from Britain and Germany, two of the largest members of the European Union, abstained from the voting, which left the proposal in limbo.

headline.seo: European Vote on Bee-Harming Pesticides Is Inconclusive
headline.main: No Decision on Bee-Harming Pesticides in Europe
headline.print_headline: No Decision on Bee-Harming Pesticides In Europe
